title: help id-ing a slot machine font
content:
any clue what font this may be?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103165635im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture8_6669.jpg)
author: scamp

comments.content: Looks a lot like Clarendon Extra Bold with added outline, except for the small curve on the left bottom side.
Thank you! I think you're right!
